name: Tower Bound
description:
The Wizards tower looms over everything.  Do you have what it takes to make it to the top and be granted one wish. Watch your step, it could be the last adventure you ever take.

Tower Bound is an in development, 3D, first person platformer created by TuiMotions. You will take on the mantle of the nameless hero as they attempt to climb the tower to get their wish. using robust traversal mechanics and the aid of a pair of magical boots, scale an everchanging tower.

If you feel like an extra challenge. test yourself in the Endless mode, How high do you think you can get?

This game is a portfolio piece and will continue to be developed.
